oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Safiya Zaghloul glass plate negatives
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Glass plate negatives of Egyptian political activist Safiya Zaghloul from the Mostafa Amin Collection. Zaghloul, known as the "Mother of the Egyptians" (أم المصريين), was a leader of the Wafd party, and wife of Egyptian revolutionary and politician Saad Zaghloul. The photos may have been taken in the mid-1930s.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Zaghloul, Safia, 1876-1946
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Rare Books and Special Collections Library; the American University in Cairo
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: Copyright the American University in Cairo, 2019
